ID of the Ethie Token NFT to be burntT"}},"_viewEpochStage()":{"details":"gets state, stage date and time (in unix) in a current weekly epoch","return":"string state, uint256 start time, uint256 end time"},"_viewNextYieldClaimDate(uint256)":{"details":"gets the next unix time in which an investor can withdraw locked ethers and earnings by burning an Ethie Token NFT and get future benefits like of the Ethie Token NFT"},"return":"true if this NFT is burnt and locked ethers and cumulative interest are transferred to the token owner"},"calculateTotal(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"gets principal principal ethers locked and interest accumulated in the NFT"},"checkLockETHDate(uint256)":{"details":"gets the date and time at which ethers were locked for an Ethie Token NFT","params":{"ethieTokenID":"uint256 the ID of the Ethie Token NFT to be burntT"}},"enableDeposits()":{"details":"re-enables any ability to continue to deposit funds can only be called by locktime based on investment SIZE, generation and funding limit Max funding limit/Value * 30 days","params":{"_eth_amount":"uint256 the amount of ethers to be locked"},"return":"uint256 locktime in seconds"},"getCurrentEpoch()":{"details":"gets the current weekly epoch ID"},"getCurrentGeneration()":{"details":"gets the ID of the current generation"},"getFundingLimit(uint256)":{"details":"gets the pre-set funding limit for the generation with id _generation"},"getcurrentFundingLimit()":{"details":"gets the current funding limit of the current generation"},"hasReachedLimit(uint256)":{"details":"true if the funding limit of the generation is reached"},"incrementGenerationInEthieToken()":{"details":"set current generation in EthieToken contract can only be called by admin"},"isWorkingDay()":{"details":"ture if now is in the stage of Six-Working-Days in a current weekly epoch"},"lockETH()":{"details":"deposit eth and receive an NFT token, which can be burned in order to retrieve locked eth and accumulated interest","return":"uint256 ID of the Ethie Token NFT minted to the funder"},"modifyFundingLimit(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"modify pre-set funding limit for a generation can only be called by admin","params":{"_fundingLimit":"the new funding limit of _generation","_generation":"the id of the generation of which the funding limit is modified"}},"setCurrentFundingLimit()":{"details":"moves the current funding to limit to next funding limit can only be called when current funding limit is already reached can only be called by admin"},"stopDeposits()":{"details":"stops any ability to continue to deposit funds can only be called by nodes.name: KTYforBurnEthie
_returnEther

nodes.documentation: @dev Updates funder profile when minting a new token to a funder
nodes.name: _updateFunder_mint

nodes.documentation:
@dev Updates generation profile when minting a new Ethie Token NFT
@param _eth_amount uint256 the amount of ethers locked for the new Ethie Token NFT
nodes.name: _updateGeneration_mint
_updateGeneration_burn

_mint

KTYforBurnEthie(uint256).details: gets the required KTY fee for burning an Ethie Token NFT

_checkLockETHDate(uint256).details: gets unix time at which ethers were locked for an Ethie Token NFT

params.ethieTokenID: uint256 the ID of the Ethie Token NFT to be burntT

_viewEpochStage().details: gets state, stage date and time (in unix) in a current weekly epoch
_viewEpochStage().return: string state, uint256 start time, uint256 end time

_viewNextYieldClaimDate(uint256).details: gets the next unix time in which an investor can withdraw locked ethers and earnings by burning an Ethie Token NFT and get future benefits like access to pricy kitties in KittiHELL and lottery benefits

params.ethieTokenID: uint256 the ID of the Ethie Token NFT to be burnt

burnNFT(uint256).details: Release ether and cumulative interest to investor by burning Ethie Token NFT Requires KTY token payment In the future, will give user lotto to redeem a high priced kitty from KittieHELL

params._ethieTokenID: uint256 the ID of the Ethie Token NFT

burnNFT(uint256).return: true if this NFT is burnt and locked ethers and cumulative interest are transferred to the token owner

calculateTotal(uint256,uint256).details: gets principal ethers locked plus the interest accumulated for an Ethie Token NFT

params._eth_amount: uint256 the amount of ethers associated with this NFT with this NFT has been locked

calculateTotal(uint256,uint256).return: uint256 principal ethers locked and interest accumulated in the NFT

checkLockETHDate(uint256).details: gets the date and time at which ethers were locked for an Ethie Token NFT

params.ethieTokenID: uint256 the ID of the Ethie Token NFT to be burntT

enableDeposits().details: re-enables any ability to continue to deposit funds can only be called by admin

ethNeededToReachFundingLimit().details: gets the difference between the funding limit and the actual funding in current generation

generateLockTime(uint256).details: Generates locktime based on investment SIZE, generation and funding limit Max funding limit/Value * 30 days

params._eth_amount: uint256 the amount of ethers to be locked

getCurrentEpoch().details: gets the current weekly epoch ID

getCurrentGeneration().details: gets the ID of the current generation

getFundingLimit(uint256).details: gets the pre-set funding limit for the generation with id _generation

getcurrentFundingLimit().details: gets the current funding limit of the current generation

hasReachedLimit(uint256).details: true if the funding limit of the generation is reached

incrementGenerationInEthieToken().details: set current generation in EthieToken contract can only be called by admin

isWorkingDay().details: ture if now is in the stage of Six-Working-Days in a current weekly epoch

lockETH().details: deposit eth and receive an NFT token, which can be burned in order to retrieve locked eth and accumulated interest
lockETH().return: uint256 ID of the Ethie Token NFT minted to the funder

modifyFundingLimit(uint256,uint256).details: modify pre-set funding limit for a generation can only be called by admin

params._generation: the id of the generation of which the funding limit is modified

setCurrentFundingLimit().details: moves the current funding to limit to next funding limit can only be called when current funding limit is already reached can only be called by admin

stopDeposits().details: stops any ability to continue to deposit funds can only be called by admin

viewEpochStageEndTime().details: gets state, stage end date and time (human-readable) in a current weekly epoch

viewEpochStageStartTime().details: gets state, stage start date and time (human-readable) in a current weekly epoch

viewNextYieldClaimDate(uint256).details: gets the next date and time in which an investor can withdraw locked ethers and earnings by burning an Ethie Token NFT and get future benefits like access to pricy kitties in KittiHELL and lottery benefits

params.ethieTokenID: uint256 the ID of the Ethie Token NFT to be burnt

viewTotalInterests().details: calculates the total interest accumulated for all Ethie Token NFTs in the latest 250 epochs
viewTotalInterests().return: uint256 total interest accumulated for all Ethie Token NFTs in the last 250 epochs
